definition: A unit of time typically used to measure the duration of an activity or event, often associated with educational or professional settings. It is commonly used to refer to a period of 60 minutes.

examples.german: Er arbeitet acht Stunden pro Tag.
examples.english: He works eight hours a day.

examples.german: Wir treffen uns in einer halben Stunde.
examples.english: We will meet in half an hour.

examples.german: Die Schule beginnt um neun Uhr morgens und endet um vier Uhr nachmittags.
examples.english: School starts at nine in the morning and ends at four in the afternoon.
